steps.name: When  Admin enter valid credentials  and clicks login button
And  Admin clicks assignment button on the navigation bar
And  Admin clicks Edit button in data table for "Assignment"
Then  Admin should see a popup  with  heading "Assignment details"
Given  Admin is in  assignment details popup window
When  Admin enters data for add|edit assignment from "<dataKey>" and "assignmentSearchBox"
Then  Error message with "Assignment name is missing" should be displayed from "<dataKey>" and "assignmentSearchBox"
